public void addRow(java.lang.String title,
                   javax.swing.JComponent... components)
Adds a tab with the given components.

Parameters:
title - the title of the tab
components - the components to add; will be put in a GridBagLayout and put in the tabbed panel

putInPanel

private javax.swing.JPanel putInPanel(javax.swing.JComponent... components)
Adds the given JComponents to a panel that can be put into the tabbed pane.

Parameters:
components - the component to add. They will be placed in a GridBagLayout.
Returns:
a panel containing the components.
